Description of incident: An employee was fired in May for creating and attempting to mail a list of names and Social Security numbers for purposes of identity fraud.  It is unclear if the dishonest employee disclosed the information of other people before being caught. Some patients had already experienced fraudulent activity. People who may have been a patient in one of the Health Department Health Centers could have been affected.  UPDATE (01/09/2013): The employee worked as a records clerk and was arrested on January 5, 2013.  She had worked for Palm Beach County Health Department since 2006 and was charged with several counts of fraud.
